ygData.authorName: An old broken clock on the wall
ygData.from: An old broken clock on the wall <douglas@...
ygData.subject: Re: Faction Standings
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I believe you get faction increases with the Soldiers of Tunare by killing Crushbone-bred orcs. I believe you can increase faction with the Scouts of
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 18 Aug 1999 AngieEQ@... wrote:

> I've been going crazy trying to figure out how to raise my faction
> with both the Soldiers of Tunare and the Scouts of Tunare.....the
> NPCs won't talk to me because I'm still indifferent to them. Any
> suggestions would be wonderful!

I believe you get faction increases with the Soldiers of Tunare by
killing Crushbone-bred orcs.

I believe you can increase faction with the Scouts of Tunare by doing
the rusty dagger quest; check out http://everquest.gamestats.com for
more info on that.


--
We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
